full_summary:
# Tender Notice for Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) - Material Testing

### Tender Details
| Category | English | French |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Title | RISO-Material Testing, Gagetown | OCIR-Essais de Matériaux - Gagetown |
| Reference Number | WS3904399563-Doc3904810725 | WS3904399563-Doc3904810725 |
| Amendment Number | 0 | 0 |

### Tender Announcement
The Department of National Defence (DND) in collaboration with the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to participate in the Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for Material Testing, Gagetown.

#### Notice Type and Method
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Method of Procurement: Competitive - Open bidding

#### Period of Standing Offer
The Standing Offer will be valid from April 1, 2023, or the date of issuance, to March 31, 2025.

#### Goods and Services Required
The contract comprises all labour, materials, tools, and equipment required to carry out laboratory testing services.

#### Procurement Category and Region
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Region: New Brunswick

#### Trade Agreements
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Contracting Entity and End User
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User: Department of National Defence (DND)

#### Contact Information
Sonia Stockman (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sonia.stockman@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice URL
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15634297?extsite=MTU2MzQyOTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Important Dates
* Publication Date: March 8, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: March 24, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (local time)

Please note that the tender status is **Expired**. 

Hope this requirement fits your needs. It's been a pleasure to assist you! Good luck with your submissions to this tender. If there is anything else I can help, please don't hesitate to reach out.  1 2 3 4
